[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
The same exchange happened at the supermarket afterwards too.
We can’t go to that shopping district for a while because it’s so awkward.
…Well, I guess if you’re going to say something about how cute cats are…
[VANILLA]: “Hm? Sniff sniff…”
[VANILLA]: “Something smells really good over there.”
[CHOCOLA]: “It does! It smells so fragrant and delicious, Master!”
[KASHOU]: “Indeed. This scent is…”
He turns his face towards the direction of the smell.
[Food Stall Cat]: “Welcome, welcome!”
[Food Stall Cat]: “Delicious freshly made takoyaki, how about that?”
[Food Stall Cat]: “Hot and hot, takoyaki with bonito flakes, how about that?”
[CHOCOLA]: “Wow, a cat running a takoyaki stall! That’s rare, Master!”

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「いい子になれるようにって！」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、厳しい。でもお陰様で色々と覚えた」
[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
[Chocola]: “So you can be a good girl!”
[Vanilla]: “Shigure, you’re strict. But thanks to you, I’ve learned so much.”
[Shopkeeper]: “Is that so? You have a wonderful master.”
[Chocola]: “Ah, but Master is Master!”
[Chocola]: “Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?”
[Vanilla]: “Translating that, Shigure means a very important friend.”
[Vanilla]: “Calling him ‘Master’ is only for our Master.”
[Shopkeeper]: “Ahaha. You’re loved, aren’t you, Master?”
[Kashou]: “Well, I’m grateful.”
He’s lightly nudged in the elbow.
He replies with an embarrassed and wry smile.
…It’s a little embarrassing outside.

Question:
無慈悲な電子音が響く携帯電話を見つめる。
……時雨と連絡さえ付けば、すぐに解決すると思ってたのに。
[ショコラ]: 「はむ、んぐんぐんぐ、朝ごはんおいしーですね！」

当の本人たちはサンドウィッチを満足そうに頬張っている。
ちなみに中身はトマトとチーズとレタス。
それに半熟の目玉焼きを挟み込んだシンプルなもの。
朝食だったらまぁこんなもんだろ。
[嘉祥]: 「お前ら、今日こそは家に帰るんだからな？」
reference_answer:
As the ruthless electronic buzz of the dropped call echoed, I stared at my cell phone.
... And here I thought that I could sort all this out if I could just talk to Shigure.
[Chocola]: 「Munch munch munch, breakfast tastes good!」
[Chocola]: 「Master's breakfast always tastes good, meow~ ♪」
[Vanilla]: 「Chocola, there's some ketchup on your cheek.」
[Vanilla]: 「It's cutely artistic. I'll lick it off. Shlurp slurp~」
The catgirls in question were happily stuffing themselves with sandwiches.
These sandwiches incidentally contained tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
With an over-easy fried egg tucked inside all of that, it was a simple meal.
Breakfast was pretty much like this.
[Kashou]: 「You two are definitely going home today, okay?」
ModelAnswer:
She stares at her mercilessly ringing cell phone.
…If I could just get in touch with Shigure, this would all be over soon.
[Chocola]: "Mmm, nom nom nom, breakfast is so good!"
[Chocola]: "Master's food is always delicious, nya~♪"
[Vanilla]: "Chocola, you've got ketchup on your cheek."
[Vanilla]: "Artistically cute. I'm going to lick it off. Smooch smooch."
The two of them are happily stuffing their faces with sandwiches.
By the way, they're filled with tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
And a simple one with a half-cooked egg sandwiched in between.
Well, this is about what you'd expect for breakfast.
[Kashou]: "Alright, you two, today's the day we head back home, got it?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
With a crisp smile, he hands over the invoice and pen.

[Kashou]: “Well then, um…”
He re-examines the received invoice.
[Kashou]: “…It seems like it’s not what I ordered.”
[Plate Supplier]: “…Eh, really?”
[Plate Supplier]: “Is it that the items are different… perhaps?”
[Kashou]: “No, but it looks like everything I ordered is in here…”
His gaze shifts to the stack of cardboard boxes piled up inside the shop.
A mountain, a mountain, and another mountain of cardboard boxes in the small store. In fact, almost the entire store was filled with cardboard boxes.
[Kashou]: “As you can see, we don’t need this many dishes here…”
[Plate Supplier]: “S-sorry! I’ll immediately confirm with headquarters!”
[Plate Supplier]: “Would you mind waiting a little while?”

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
**Foodware Vendor:** “It seems there was a mix-up due to our mistake, and these orders have become jumbled together…”
**Foodware Vendor:** “I believe Mr. Minaduki will be needing these immediately…”
**Foodware Vendor:** “If it’s not too much trouble, would you mind receiving the ordered dishes?”
**Kashou:** “Receive the order…?”
**Kashou:** “…Huh? From this pile?”
A towering mountain of cardboard boxes.
I’m momentarily speechless.
They’re all uniformly the same box, after all.
You can’t tell what’s inside until you open them.
And looking at the invoices, they’re all top-tier tea sets and tableware.
So, I have to be extremely careful handling them; otherwise, it could lead to disaster.
**Kashou:** “Um, well, we also need to prepare for opening today, so if you could take these with you today…”
**Kashou:** “…Would that take a considerable amount of time right now?”

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「……ネコくらい単純に生きられれば、色々と楽なんだろうけどな」
窓に貼られている店の名前に目を向けながら。
苦笑いを振り払って、届いたばかりのティーセットを片付け始めた。
[バニラ]: 「あれ、今日はあのたこ焼き屋がいない」
昨日と同じ夕方の公園通り。
でも今日は屋台は見当たらない。
ネコたちを実家に送ろうにも今日に限って誰もおらず。
俺も実家の鍵は置いて来てしまっていた。
だから時雨が帰宅するまで時間調整で買い物へ。
[ショコラ]: 「……え？　あ、ご、ごめんバニラ！」
[ショコラ]: 「何だっけ、マタタビだっけ？」
[バニラ]: 「だいたいそんな感じ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... It must be pretty nice to live the simple life of a catgirl, huh?」
I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.
[Chocola]: 「... Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!」
[Chocola]: 「What was it called... catnip?」
[Vanilla]: 「That sounds about right.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: “…If only cats could live as simply as that, life would be so much easier.”

He glanced at the shop name plastered on the window.

Shaking off his wry smile, he began to unpack the tea set that had just arrived.

[Vanilla]: “Oh, that takoyaki stall isn’t here today.”

It was the same evening as yesterday, along Park Street.

But there wasn’t a single food stall in sight today.

He was supposed to send the cats home, but of all days, no one was around.

And he’d left his house key back at the shop.

So, until Shigure got back, he’d have to adjust the schedule and go shopping.

[Chocola]: “…Huh? Oh, s-sorry, Vanilla!”

[Chocola]: “What was it again? Matatabi?”

[Vanilla]: “Something like that.”

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ、疲れたなら少し休んでくか？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、はい、少しだけ……」
[ショコラ]: 「でも大丈夫ですから。心配かけてごめんなさい、ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「……別に謝ることじゃないだろ」
困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。
[嘉祥]: 「じゃあちょうどそこにベンチがあるし、少し休んでくか」
[バニラ]: 「じゃあ私、何か飲み物買ってくる」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、頼む。全員分な」
[バニラ]: 「了解。任された」
バニラに小銭を渡してショコラをベンチに促す。
よく吹き抜ける潮風が公園の木々をざわめかせる。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, if you're tired, why don't we rest a bit?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, okay. Maybe a little bit...」
[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Understood. Leave it to me.」
I handed Vanilla some change and offered the bench to Chocola.
The constant sea breeze rustled the trees in the park.
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: "Chocola, if you're tired, why don't you take a break for a bit?"
[Chocola]: "Ah, yes, just a little..."
[Chocola]: "But it's alright. Sorry to worry you, Master."
[Kashou]: "...There's no need to apologize."
He gives her a troubled smile as he bows his head.
He knows exactly why she lacks energy.
So all he can do is stay silent.
[Kashou]: "Well then, there's a bench right over there, so take a break for a bit."
[Vanilla]: "Then I'll go buy some drinks."
[Kashou]: "Ah, thanks. Get everyone's."
[Vanilla]: "Understood. Consider it done."
He hands Vanilla some change and encourages Chocola to sit on the bench.
The strong sea breeze rustles through the park trees.

Chocola: “What’s with all the ‘ka-roo’ talk?”
Shigure: “To be formal, it’s called chronic fatigue.”
Shigure: “Simply put, your body is just too exhausted.”
Vanilla: “She was fine until yesterday…”
Shigure: “When you’re too tired, apparently you lose track of how fatigued you actually are.”
Chocola: “…So being too tired makes you feel energetic?”
Vanilla: “That’s…”
Chocola: “……Pfft.”

[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female

[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「……疲れすぎると自分でも気づかないって、さっき時雨が言ってたろ？」
[時雨]: 「そうなる前に気付いてたはずです。はぐらかさないで下さい」
姿勢を正して、真面目な顔で俺にじっと視線を注ぐ。
空白の時間が流れても、身じろぎひとつせずに俺を見ていた。
その様子に根負けして、溜息を零して降参する。
[嘉祥]: 「……俺が頑張らなくちゃ、と思ったからだよ」
枕に頭を預けると天井に向けて呟く。
[嘉祥]: 「この間、ショコラとバニラとデートしてさ」
[嘉祥]: 「その時に思ったんだよ」
[嘉祥]: 「もうただのペットじゃなくて、家族で、恋人だって」
[嘉祥]: 「だから、俺が勝手に出てきたことで、あいつらにあんまり苦労かけたくないんだよ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... You said it yourself that if you get too tired, you don't notice it, right?」
[Shigure]: 「You should have noticed before that. Don't try to evade the question.」
She sat up straight and stared at me intensely.
We waited in silence for a while, yet she still stared at me without budging an inch.
Seeing her persistence, I decided to give in and surrendered with a sigh.
[Kashou]: 「... It's because I thought that I had to work harder.」
I murmured, leaning my head back on the pillow and looking at the ceiling.
[Kashou]: 「Recently, I went on a date with Chocola and Vanilla...」
[Kashou]: 「... It was then that it struck me.」
[Kashou]: 「That they're not just pets, but family. Lovers, even.」
[Kashou]: 「So I didn't want them to have to work hard because of my choice to leave home.」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: “…Shigure said earlier that you don’t realize how tired you are until it’s too late, right?”
[Shigure]: “I would have noticed before it got to that point. Please don’t avoid the issue.”
She straightens her posture and fixes me with a serious gaze.
Even as time passes in silence, she doesn't flinch from looking at me.
Faced with this unwavering stare, I sigh and surrender.
[Kashou]: “…I just thought I had to do my best for them.”
He rests his head on the pillow and mutters towards the ceiling.
[Kashou]: “The other day, Chocola and Vanilla and I went on a date.”
[Kashou]: “That’s when it hit me.”
[Kashou]: “They’re not just pets anymore. They’re family, my lovers.”
[Kashou]: “So, because I suddenly showed up, I don’t want them to suffer too much.”

metadata:
[character] Name: Vanilla (バニラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「時雨のお陰様で、予想以上に客足が伸びたこともあるけどな」
[時雨]: 「あら何のことでしょう？」
俺がそれ以上は追求しないことにすると、
時雨も小さく笑って首を傾げて応える。
素直に答えるくらいなら直接言ってるだろうし。
そんなところも昔からの時雨らしさだ。
[時雨]: 「兄さまの仰ることも分かりますが」
[時雨]: 「でもネコは賢い子たちですから。人間の家族にも、パートナーにもなれるくらいに」
[時雨]: 「……だからこそ」
そこで一呼吸を置いて。
困ったような笑顔を浮かべて俺を見る。
[時雨]: 「……自分にも頼ってもらえないのは、きっと寂しいことだと思いますよ？」
その笑顔に胸がズキリと痛む。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well, it's your own fault our clientele increased so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Oh? Just what might you be talking about?」
I decided not to press further.
Shigure smiled slightly and tilted her head in response.
If she was going to address that issue honestly, she would already have done so by now.
That's how Shigure had always been.
[Shigure]: 「I understand what you are saying, Nii-sama...」
[Shigure]: 「... but catgirls are clever. Clever enough to become family, and even lovers, to humans.」
[Shigure]: 「... And that's exactly why.」
She took a deep breath...
... and looked at me with a kind of troubled smile.
[Shigure]: 「... I think there would be a feeling of sadness to not be relied upon.」
Her smile stabbed at my heart.
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: “Thanks to Shigure, business has been better than expected.”
[Shigure]: “Oh? Whatever for?”
If I pressed him further,
Shigure would tilt her head and smile softly in response.
He’d probably just tell me directly if he was going to be honest.
That’s just how Shigure is.
[Shigure]: “I understand what you, Master, are saying.”
[Shigure]: “But cats are intelligent creatures. They can become family members or partners for humans.”
[Shigure]: “…That’s precisely why…”
He paused for a breath.
Then he looked at me with a troubled smile.
[Shigure]: “…Not being relied upon must be lonely for you, Master?”
His smile pierced my heart.

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
携帯の画面を見て眉根を寄せる。
そのまま動かない時雨を見て着信元を察する。
[嘉祥]: 「実家からだろ？　早く出ないと」
[時雨]: 「……用件など出ずとも分かります。行き先を告げずに出て来たので」
時雨の手の中の携帯が鳴り止む。
同じように時雨も黙ったまま、
携帯をぎゅっと握り締める。
[時雨]: 「……私がまだ年端もいかぬ女だからですか？」
[時雨]: 「それとも、世間知らずの子どもだからですか？」
[時雨]: 「……だから、私はお父さまとお母さまの言うことに従わねばならないのでしょうか」
[時雨]: 「……私は、ここにいたいのです」
[時雨]: 「兄さまが苦しまれてる時くらい……せめて、お傍にいるだけでも……」
reference_answer:
She looked at her phone and furrowed her brows.
When Shigure just sat there motionlessly, I could pretty much figure out who it was.
[Kashou]: 「It's from home, right? You should answer.」
[Shigure]: 「... I don't need to answer to know what they want. I left without saying where I was going.」
The cell phone in Shigure's hand stopped ringing.
Shigure fell silent...
... and gripped the cell phone tightly.
[Shigure]: 「... Is it because I'm still a young girl?」
[Shigure]: 「... Or is it because I'm naïve to the world?」
[Shigure]: 「... Is that why I must do what mother and father ask of me?」
[Shigure]: 「... I want to be here.」
[Shigure]: 「When Nii-sama is suffering... at the very least, let me be by his side...」
ModelAnswer:
She frowned, looking at the phone screen. Recognizing the caller from Minaduki Shigure’s expression, Kashou spoke up.

[Kashou]: “It’s your family, isn’t it? You’d better answer.”

[Shigure]: “…I can tell even without them saying anything. They haven't told me where they're calling from.”

The ringing finally stopped in Shigure's hand. She remained silent, clutching the phone tightly.

[Shigure]: “…Is it because I’m still a young woman?”

[Shigure]: “Or perhaps, because I’m naive and foolish?”

[Shigure]: “…So, is that why I must obey Father and Mother?”

[Shigure]: “…I want to stay here.”

[Shigure]: “Even when Brother is suffering… at least just be by his side…”

metadata:

[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[element] Name: Bell (鈴) | Type: Accessory
Question:
[バニラ]: 「他の病院の場所は知らないし……道を聞ける人も、歩いてない……」
[バニラ]: 「でも、このまま帰るわけにも行かないし……どうしたら……」
不安でぎゅっと手を握り合う。
冷たいシャッターを見上げて下唇をきゅっと噛む。
[警察]: 「キミたち、何してるの？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ……警察さん！」
[ショコラ]: 「開いてる病院教えてもらえませんか！？」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまが大変で！　それで、お医者さん呼ぼうと思って！」
[バニラ]: 「病院が休みで、どうすればいいか分からなくて……」
[警察]: 「飼い主さんが？　それは大変だけど……」
[警察]: 「キミたち鈴は？　持ってないの？」
[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「あっ……！」
指摘されて首元に手を当てる。
reference_answer:
[Vanilla]: 「We don't know any other clinics... and there aren't any people on the street to ask.」
[Vanilla]: 「We can't just go back like this... What should we...」
We gripped each other's hands tightly in worry.
Looking up at the cold shutters, we chewed our lips in concern.
[Police Officer]: 「What are you two doing there?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah... Ms. Policewoman!」
[Chocola]: 「Where's the closest open clinic?!」
[Chocola]: 「Master is in trouble, so we wanted to get a doctor!」
[Vanilla]: 「The clinic is closed and we don't know what to do...」
[Police Officer]: 「Your Master is? That's a quite a problem, but...」
[Police Officer]: 「Where are your Bells? Don't you have them?」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Ah...!」
We touched our necks where she pointed.
ModelAnswer:
[VANILLA]: “I don’t know where any other hospitals are… and no one who can give directions has walked by…”
[VANILLA]: “But I can’t just go home like this… what should we do…”
She clenches her hands tightly with anxiety.
She looks up at the cold shutter, biting down on her lower lip.
[OFFICER]: “What are you two doing here?”
[CHOCOLA]: “Ah… Officer!”
[CHOCOLA]: “Could you tell us which hospital is open!?”
[CHOCOLA]: “Our master is in trouble! So we thought to call a doctor!”
[VANILLA]: “The hospitals are closed, and I don’t know what to do…”
[OFFICER]: “Your owner? That’s unfortunate…”
[OFFICER]: “What about you two, Bell? Don’t you have it?”
[CHOCOLA & VANILLA]: “Ah…!”
They instinctively reach for the bell around their necks.

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
朝イチから予想外の光景に頭がついて来てくれない。
[時雨]: 「おはようございます、兄さま」
[時雨]: 「私は今回の一件で色々と考えたのです」
晴れ晴れとした曇りの無い笑顔。
他のネコたちも同じように笑顔を俺に向けている。
つう、と冷たい汗が伝うのを感じながら、
[嘉祥]: 「はぁ……考えたって、何を……？」
何とかそれだけを口にする。
[時雨]: 「今回の一件で、兄さまに無理をするなというのが無理なことがよく分かりました」
[時雨]: 「ですが、私も妹として夜も眠れぬほど心配をさせられたのもまた事実……」
[時雨]: 「ならば人員を増やして、兄さまの負担を減らすのが一番の得策と、時雨は考えたのです」
[嘉祥]: 「…………はぁ」
reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」
ModelAnswer:
My head just isn’t catching up to the unexpected scene from first thing this morning.
[Shigure]: “Good morning, Brother.”
[Shigure]: “I’ve been thinking a lot about what happened this time.”
A clear and cloudless smile.
The other cats are all directing their smiles towards me as well.
*Thud,* I feel cold sweat trickling down my back,
[Kashou]: “Haa… Thinking about what…?”
I somehow manage to get those words out.
[Shigure]: “This time, Brother, it became very clear that ‘don’t push yourself too hard’ is something you can’t do.”
[Shigure]: “But as your younger sister, I was also kept up at night worrying… it’s a fact.”
[Shigure]: “Therefore, Shigure thought the best solution would be to increase personnel and reduce Brother’s burden.”
[Kashou]: “…………Haa.”

俺の母親――水無月淡雪は、ちょっと大袈裟なところがあった。

[Awayuki]: 「Aah... I'm starting to cry...」

My mother, Awayuki Minaduki, tends to blow things out of proportion.

My mother—Minaduki Awayuki—had a slightly dramatic side.

reference_answer:

[Maple]: 「Tea leaves with a rich aroma suit a party atmosphere well. Today, I went with a champagne flavor.」

reference_answer:

All of the catgirls have their eyes alight.

This man is my father, Suhama Minaduki.

I tense up, bracing myself.
The cats held their breaths.

Question:
俺は、それだけを告げると、水無月の家から出ていた。まるで逃げるように。
いろいろなことが頭の中で駆け巡り、思考がごちゃごちゃになった。
気がつけば、俺は夜の公園にいた。
[嘉祥]: 「あ……」
家の鍵もサイフも、全て鞄に入れて、置いてきてしまった。
[嘉祥]: 「……なにやってるんだ、俺は」
[ショコラ]: 「……ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ……！」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人、忘れ物」
バニラの手には、俺の鞄があった。
[嘉祥]: 「持ってきてくれたのか、バニラ」
[バニラ]: 「当然のこと。野宿は困る」
[嘉祥]: 「そりゃそうだな」
鍵がなかったら、俺だけでなく２匹も家に入れないところだ。
reference_answer:
That's all I say before leaving the Minaduki house. Almost as if I'm running away.
I have so many things running through my mind that my thoughts are a jumbled mess.
Before I realize it, I'm standing in the park in the middle of the night.
[Kashou]: 「Aah...」
I left my house keys, wallet, and everything else in my bag back at the house.
[Kashou]: 「...What am I even doing?」
[Chocola]: 「...Master.」
[Kashou]: 「Chocola...!」
[Vanilla]: 「You forgot this, Master.」
Vanilla is holding my bag.
[Kashou]: 「You fetched that for me, Vanilla?」
[Vanilla]: 「Naturally. We can't camp outside.」
[Kashou]: 「Good point.」
Without the key to the house, not only would I be locked out, but so would these two.
ModelAnswer:
I gave that one statement, and then I left the Minaduki house. As if running away.
Various things raced through my head, and my thoughts became jumbled.
Before I knew it, I was in the park at night.

[Kashou]: “Ah…”
I’d put all the keys and wallet into my bag and forgotten to take it with me.
[Kashou]: “…What am I doing?”
[Chocola]: “…Master.”
[Kashou]: “Chocola…!”
[Vanilla]: “Master, you forgot something.”
In Vanilla’s hand was my bag.
[Kashou]: “You brought it here for me, Vanilla?”
[Vanilla]: “Of course. It would be troublesome to sleep outdoors.”
[Kashou]: “Yeah, that’s true.”
If I didn’t have the key, both of them wouldn’t be able to get into the house either.

大袈裟な――と思ったが、俺は時雨の応援に甘えることにした。
チェックインを済ませ、部屋へ。

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.

I needed to contact a supplier about something. It wasn’t urgent, but it was best to call them early.

For a privately owned patisserie like mine, that’s pretty normal, I think. But I personally negotiate with each of my suppliers.

If you buy large quantities of ingredients that aren't widely distributed, some farmers will even sell them to you. The pursuit of flavor is also a journey in search of ingredients.

When everyone else is excited about sightseeing, it feels out of place to talk about work, so I said I had private business and left the room.

Just to be safe, I stepped outside the inn as well, deciding to speak somewhere quiet.

I make the call.

They were surprised it was an overseas order, but they seem willing to ship it somehow.

I return inside the inn.

[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: “Well, I guess I’ll try one of these.”
He bought a hot spring manju from a food stall. It was freshly baked and steaming hot.
Taking a bite, it was fluffy and had a chewier texture than he expected.
As the red bean paste crumbled on his tongue, sweetness spread across his palate.
[Kashou]: “I see… mmm… this is delicious.”
The sweets I make, and the traditional Japanese sweets from my family’s shop, never involve warm dishes like this. Eating steaming hot manju while saying ‘mmm’ was an interesting experience in itself.
[Kashou]: “Come to think of it, I’ve been to this onsen town several times… but I’ve never eaten here before.”
It’s because there weren’t any cats back then.
Even when traveling with my parents and Shigure, the four of us never talked about grabbing a quick bite.

I take a breath to regain my composure.
Close call. I almost started shouting in front of everyone.

[Kashou]: 「Maple, Cinnamon? You guys are still here?」
I thought that the shop would be closed by now, but here they are...

[Cinnamon]: 「We couldn't help ourselves~ So the two of us recounted it~」
It's rare that our sold stock doesn't add up with the money in the register. If it's too much of a difference, it could be a problem, but...
[Kashou]: 「How much didn't add up?」
[Maple]: 「One yen.」

I thought the shop had closed already…

It’s rare for sold items and the register total not to match. Though, it’s a bit much when it *does* happen…

Maple: “One yen.”

**Fraise:** "In that case, I'll work harder."
**Kashou:** "What should I say...?"
Apologizing and feeling pathetic. Of course, gratitude is the greatest of all.

Question:

[嘉祥]: 「フレーズはすごく小さい仔ネコだったし、ほんの短い間だったから、覚えてないと思うけど」

[嘉祥]: 「言ってくれればよかったのに」

reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「...What is the matter?」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, no. Just a little trip down memory lane.」
[Kashou]: 「Actually, I lived together with you, Fraise, albeit for just a short while.」
[Kashou]: 「You were a super small kitten back then, and it was a really short time, so I don't think you remember.」
[Kashou]: 「You've been smart ever since you were a kid.」

[Kashou]: 「Hm?」

[Kashou]: 「Dang, you should have told me.」
[Fraise]: 「Well, you seemed to have more pressing matters to attend to...」
[Fraise]: 「I just remember; that's all.」

Question:
[フレーズ]: 「わたし、お兄さんに憧れて……お店を手伝っていました」
[ベニエ]: 「それでここの飼いネコになってずっと手伝いたいって言いだして、名前もフレーズにしたのね」
[嘉祥]: 「確かネコは３か月の頃に名前を決めるが、そこから来たのか……」
[フレーズ]: 「今、お兄さんは大変なときだから……わたしのことなんて、言わないようにって思っていたのに」
[フレーズ]: 「ずっと、夢見ていたマカロンを食べたら……我慢できなくなってしまって……」
[時雨]: 「いいんですよ、フレーズ。そんなに我慢しなくても、兄様はわかってくれます」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、もちろんだよ。覚えててくれて、ありがとうな、フレーズ」
[嘉祥]: 「それと、師匠のことも。いっぱい手伝ってくれて、感謝してる」
reference_answer:
[Fraise]: 「I've always looked up to you... and helped out in the shop because of that.」
[Beignet]: 「Then, once she became the catgirl here, she would always say she wanted to help out around shop and even made her name Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「If memory serves, a catgirl picks their name when they're three months old, so that's when she came here, huh?」
[Fraise]: 「I know you're really busy right now, so... I decided that I wouldn't say anything about me.」
[Fraise]: 「But now that I've eaten the macaron I've dreamed about... I just couldn't control myself any longer...」
[Shigure]: 「It's fine, Fraise. You needn't contain yourself so badly. Nii-sama understands.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, of course. Thank you so much for remembering, Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「Also, I appreciate you helping out Mentor in such big ways as well.」
ModelAnswer:
[Fraise]: “I admired my brother so much… I was helping out at his shop.”
[Beignet]: “And then he started saying how he wanted a cat to help him forever, and even gave it the name Fraise.”
[Kashou]: “If I recall correctly, we decide on names for cats around three months old. Is that where this came from…?”
[Fraise]: “Right now, my brother is going through a tough time… so he told me not to say anything about myself.”
[Fraise]: “But after eating the macarons I’d been dreaming of… I couldn’t hold back anymore…”
[Shigure]: “It’s okay, Fraise. There’s no need to be so patient. Your brother will understand.”
[Kashou]: “Ah, of course. Thanks for remembering, Fraise.”
[Kashou]: “And also, thanks to the Mentor too. You’ve helped out a lot.”

俺たちは、今夜には発つ予定だった。フランスと日本の時差は７時間。約束の３日間で帰宅するには、そのくらいの時間に出なくては。

We both have plans to depart tonight. There's a seven hour time difference between France and Japan, so we need to leave by then in order to make it back home when I promised.
In the end, I still don't know what it is I'm missing.
I feel a lot better mentally, though...

In the end, I still didn’t know what was missing in myself.
I felt a lot better mentally, though…

I became her apprentice to learn Western pastry making, so I avoided mentioning my parents owning a long-standing Japanese pastry shop to make things simpler...

ModelAnswer:

He had been avoiding mentioning his family’s old-established *wagashi* shop because it felt out of place when he was apprenticing to learn Western sweets…
[Beignet]: “That is…”
[Shigure]: “Forgive me, Brother! I realized this morning that…”
[Kashou]: “Huh?”

[Kashou]: “No, it’s fine. I wasn’t hiding anything.”
[Beignet]: “Yes… Shigure told us the circumstances.”
[Kashou]: “I see. Ah, sorry for bringing up unnecessary things. You were talking about La Soleil having traditions, right?”

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは……そうだけど……」
[嘉祥]: 「でも、あれこれ命令されて、釈然としない気持ちがあったのは間違いない」
[嘉祥]: 「素直に従う気になれなくて、フランスに留学したんだ」

[時雨]: 「お客さんに認めてもらうために頑張るのは、お店をやっている以上は、当然のことだと思いますが」
[嘉祥]: 「う、む……」

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「W-Well... That's true, but...」
[Kashou]: 「But I definitely felt frustrated after having him boss me around.」
[Kashou]: 「I couldn't find it in me to comply, so I went to study abroad in France.」
[Shigure]: 「If you just wanted father's approval, then I wouldn't think you'd need to bake cakes to please the girls.」
[Kashou]: 「No, that was just...」
[Shigure]: 「I do think that trying your best for your customer's approval is natural so long as you operate a business.」
[Kashou]: 「Um, yeah...」
[Shigure]: 「But you're not making pastries just to be a rebel. That much I know well.」
[Shigure]: 「The smile on your face when you make the girls happy... What part of that has to do with rebelling against Father?」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: “W-Well, that’s… true, but…”
[Kashou]: “But I definitely felt a sense of reluctance at being ordered around like that.”
[Kashou]: “I couldn’t bring myself to just obey, so I went to study in France.”
[Shigure]: “If you only wanted Father’s approval, you didn’t need to bake cakes to please the cats.”
[Kashou]: “N-No, that’s…”
[Shigure]: “Working hard to gain customers’ recognition is simply part of running a business, isn't it?”
[Kashou]: “U-Umm…”
[Shigure]: “Brother isn’t just making sweets out of spite. I know that well.”
[Shigure]: “When the cats are happy with his treats, Brother’s smile… where exactly is the defiance towards Father in *that*?”

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……けっこう遅くなったな」
[時雨]: 「そうですね。夕食には戻れるかと思っていたのですが」
飛行機の到着がやや遅れ、俺たちは夜になって帰宅した。
まだネコたちが店にいるだろうから、と時雨も水無月家ではなく、俺と一緒にラ・ソレイユへ。
[嘉祥]: 「さすがにこの行脚はキツかったな」
しかも、向こうでは立ち仕事が多かった。
[時雨]: 「私は、ぜんぜん大丈夫です。　お気遣いは無用です、兄様」
気丈に笑みを浮かべるが、疲労の色は隠せない。
[嘉祥]: 「ウチで休んでいくといい。　なんなら泊まって、明日帰ってもいいし」
[時雨]: 「お泊まりですか！？」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Phew... It sure got late.」
[Shigure]: 「That it did. I thought that we could make it back in time for dinner.」
My plane landed somewhat late, so I end up home around nighttime.
Figuring that the catgirls would be at the shop, Shigure comes with me to La Soleil instead of the Minaduki house.
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, I guess the trek over was asking a lot.」
Plus, we did so much work on our feet overseas.
[Shigure]: 「I'm perfectly fine. You needn't worry about me, Nii-sama.」
Shigure gives a firm smile, but she can't hide her exhaustion.
[Kashou]: 「You can rest up at my house. You can also stay over and go back home tomorrow, if you want.」
[Shigure]: 「Stay over?!」
ModelAnswer:
[Kashou]: “Phew… we’re pretty late.”
[Shigure]: “Yes, I was starting to worry if we’d make it back for dinner.”
The plane arrived a bit late, so we returned home at night.
Since the cats would still be at the shop, Shigure decided not to go to the Minaduki house either and came with me to La Soleil.
[Kashou]: “This trip was tough, even for you.”
And there was a lot of standing work over there too.
[Shigure]: “I’m perfectly fine. No need to worry about me, Brother.”
She forced a smile, but the signs of fatigue were clear.
[Kashou]: “You should rest at our place. You can stay overnight and head back tomorrow if you want.”
[Shigure]: “Stay over?!”

かといって、送っていくほどの余裕もなく。俺も明日は早くから大忙しだろうし。

ちょっと懐かしい。

そんなことを話しつつ、俺たちはラ・ソレイユへと戻るのだった。

reference_answer:
That being said, I don't have the leisure to drop her off at home either. I'm going to be super busy starting bright and early tomorrow.
[Shigure]: 「What a turn of events... To think that I would be in the same bed as Nii-sama once more!」
[Kashou]: 「As if. I'd be using the sofa in the living room, so don't worry.」
[Kashou]: 「I used to sleep there whenever Chocola and Vanilla took over my bed, after all.」
Kind of takes me down memory lane.
[Shigure]: 「But that was at the start of spring, right? It's the middle of winter now, Nii-sama.」
[Kashou]: 「Urk... Well, I'll just use my coat as a blanket.」
[Shigure]: 「I would rather you not catch a cold, Nii-sama.」
As we share a back-and-forth, the two of us head in to La Soleil.
[Kashou]: 「Hey, we're back.」
ModelAnswer:
“Even so, I don’t have the luxury of giving you a ride. I’ll be busy early tomorrow too.”
[Shigure]: “What is this… to sleep in the same bed with my brother again!”
[Kashou]: “There’s no way that’s happening. I’m using the sofa in the living room, so it’s fine.”
[Kashou]: “I slept there when Chocola and Vanilla took the beds too, you know?”
A little nostalgic.
[Shigure]: “That was back in spring, wasn’t it? It’s midwinter now, Master.”
[Kashou]: “Ugh… well, I’ll use my coat as a blanket then.”
[Shigure]: “I’d be troubled if you caught a cold from your brother.”
While talking like that, we returned to La Soleil.
[Kashou]: “I’m home.”

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
今夜のクリスマス・パーティーのために作ったケーキだ。
父親は何と言うだろうか？
俺は不思議な高揚感に包まれていた。
[一同]: 「メリー・クリスマスにゃ！メリ……クリメリー・クリスマスーメリー・クリスマス♪メリー・クリスマスです～♪メリー・クリスマスッ！！メリー・クリスマス」
[淡雪]: 「めりーくりすます」
[嘉祥]: 「って……親父は、どこいった？」
まさか、今回は顔を合わすこともしないつもりか？
[淡雪]: 「ふふ……心配しなくても、ちょっとしたら帰ってくるわ」
[淡雪]: 「町内会の呑み会に、差し入れに行っているだけだから」
[時雨]: 「それ、帰れなくなるのでは……？」
[淡雪]: 「最近はそういうの、無理に呑ませたり、付き合わせたりするのは、ダメらしいから」
reference_answer:
This is the cake I've made for tonight's Christmas party.
I wonder what dad will say about it?
I feel a strange sense of exhilaration coursing through me.
[Everyone]: 「Meowry Christmas!!Merry... Xmas.Merry Christmas!Merry Christmas♪Merry Christmas~♪Merry Christmas!!Merry Christmas!」
[Awayuki]: 「Merry Christmas!」
[Kashou]: 「Oh... Where did Dad go off to?」
Don't tell me he doesn't plan to show his face tonight?
[Awayuki]: 「Tee hee... No need to worry. He'll be back shortly.」
[Awayuki]: 「He's just going to the neighborhood association's drinking party to provide refreshments.」
[Shigure]: 「Isn't that the thing he doesn't come back home from...?」
[Awayuki]: 「As of late, it seems they're not allowed to do things like that—forcing people to drink, party along with them, things of that nature.」
ModelAnswer:
“This is the cake I made for tonight’s Christmas party. What will Father say? I was strangely filled with anticipation.”

[Everyone]: “Merry Christmas! Meri… Cristma-meri Christmasu-mery Christmas♪ Merry Christmas~♪ Merry Christmas!! Merry Christmas!”
[Awayuki]: “Merī kurisumasu.”
[Kashou]: “Huh… where’d Dad go?”

Could it be he doesn’t intend to show his face this time?
[Awayuki]: “Heh… don’t worry, he’ll be back in a bit.”
[Awayuki]: “He’s just going to drop off some refreshments for the neighborhood association gathering.”
[Shigure]: “Won’t that make him late coming home…?”
[Awayuki]: “Apparently, they’re trying not to force people to join or bring things these days.”

[character] Name: Cinnamon (シナモン) | Gender: Female
Question:
[メイプル]: 「そういえば、時雨が勝手にフランスに行ったことは、ちゃんと許してもらえたの？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[シナモン]: 「ああ～、置き手紙１つだったから、お母さん怒ってましたよね～？」
[淡雪]: 「そうねー。相談もなしに急に行っちゃうものだから、心配したわー」
[時雨]: 「申し訳ありませんでした……」
[淡雪]: 「でもまぁ、嘉祥が一緒だったみたいだし」
[嘉祥]: 「俺も驚いたけどな」
[淡雪]: 「お土産のフィナンシェが美味しかったから許したわ♪」
母親は怒ると海より深く静かに怒るタイプだが、美味しい食べ物で、だいたい何でも許してくれるのだった。
reference_answer:
[Maple]: 「That reminds me, did he ever forgive you for just up and going to France, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Cinnamon]: 「Aah~ You only left a letter behind, which made Mom upset, right~?」
[Awayuki]: 「That's right. She just ran off out of the blue without discussing it at all; it worried me sick.」
[Shigure]: 「I apologize for that...」
[Awayuki]: 「Oh well, it seems that you were with Kashou anyway.」
[Kashou]: 「Yeah, which was a surprise to me, too.」
[Awayuki]: 「The financier you gave me as a souvenir was delicious, so you're forgiven♪」
My mother is the type that when she gets angry, her anger is as deep and silent as the ocean. She forgives almost anything if you give her something tasty, though.
ModelAnswer:
[Maple]: “By the way, did you get permission for going to France without telling anyone?”
[Shigure]: “Ugh…”
[Cinnamon]: “Oh~ Mom was mad because there was a note left behind, right~?”
[Awayuki]: “That’s right. She went so suddenly without even consulting us, I was worried sick.”
[Shigure]: “I’m very sorry…”
[Awayuki]: “Well, since Kashou was with you…”
[Kashou]: “I was surprised myself, though.”
[Awayuki]: “The financiers were delicious as souvenirs, so I forgave you♪”
Her mother gets angry as quietly and deeply as the ocean, but she’ll forgive almost anything for delicious food.

Question:
[淡雪]: 「ええ、フランスのラ・ソレイユっていうお店の」
[嘉祥]: 「えっ、師匠の焼き菓子をお土産にしてたのか！？」
[アズキ]: 「時雨ー！？」
[時雨]: 「じ、実はキャリーケースに１箱しか入らなかったんです！」
[時雨]: 「ネコたちのぶんは、兄様が作ってくださいますよ。　そうですよね？」
[嘉祥]: 「あ……ああ……同じように作れるかなぁ……？」
[ショコラ]: 「お師匠さまのフィナンシェは、ご主人さまのと味が違うんですか？」
[嘉祥]: 「そうだな。そもそも、使っている材料も違うし」
全ての材料をフランスから取り寄せていたら、超高級店みたいな価格設定になってしまう。
reference_answer:
[Awayuki]: 「Yes, from a shop called 'La Soleil' in France.」
[Kashou]: 「Huh? You gave her my mentor's baked goods as a souvenir?!」
[Azuki]: 「Shigure?!」
[Shigure]: 「Th-The truth is... I could only fit one box in my carry-on case!」
[Shigure]: 「Nii-sama will make all the catgirls's portions. Isn't that right?」
[Kashou]: 「S-Sure... Can I even make it the same, though...?」
[Chocola]: 「Is your mentor's financier different in taste than yours, Master?」
[Kashou]: 「It is. Right down to the ingredients we use.」
If I were to get all my ingredients from France, we'd have to have some super high-class patisserie prices to recoup.
ModelAnswer:
[Awayuki]: “Yes, it’s a shop called La Soleil in France.”
[Kashou]: “Huh? You brought back the master baker’s sweets as souvenirs!?”
[Azuki]: “Shigure—!?”
[Shigure]: “W-well, there was only one box that fit in the carry case!”
[Shigure]: “The cats’ share will be made by my brother. Right?”
[Kashou]: “Ah… ah… I wonder if I can make something similar…?”
[Chocola]: “Master’s financiers taste different from your teacher's, Master?”
[Kashou]: “That’s right. In the first place, the ingredients are different too.” If all the ingredients were imported from France, it would be like a super high-class shop.

[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[時雨]: 「わぁ、クリスマスのプレゼントですか！？ありがとうございます、母様！」
[淡雪]: 「ちょっと早いかもしれないけれど、嘉祥ってば、また怒って帰っちゃうかもしれないでしょう？」
[時雨]: 「うっ……」
[嘉祥]: 「そ、それは今日はないから！　信用してって」
[淡雪]: 「はい、嘉祥にも」
[嘉祥]: 「あ、うん……ありがとう」
[淡雪]: 「開けてみて？」
言われるがままに、包装紙を取って小箱を開けた。
[嘉祥]: 「……写真立て？」
写真は入っていないようだ。
[淡雪]: 「今年の想い出の１枚を部屋に飾ってみたら、楽しいと思うのよ？」
そういえば、母親が欲しがっていたとかで、誕生日に時雨がプレゼントしたのを思い出す。
reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「Wow, a Christmas present?! Thank you so much, Mother!」
[Awayuki]: 「It might be a bit early, but Kashou just might get all huffy and go back home again.」
[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.
ModelAnswer:
[Shigure]: "Wow, a Christmas present!? Thank you, Mother!"
[Awayuki]: "It might be a little early, but Kashou here might get angry and come home again, don't you think?"
[Shigure]: "Ugh..."
[Kashou]: "N-No way today! Just trust me."
[Awayuki]: "Yes, Kashou too."
[Kashou]: "Ah, okay... thanks."
[Awayuki]: "Open it?"
As told, he tore off the wrapping paper and opened the small box.
[Kashou]: "...A photo stand?"
It seems there's no photo inside.
[Awayuki]: "I thought it would be fun to display one of this year’s memories in your room, you know?"
Come to think of it, Shigure gave her mother one for her birthday because she wanted it.

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまの！　あ、でも、どの写真が……うーん……」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、ソレイユ開店記念のときの写真にする。　ご主人さまとバニラと３人で撮ったやつ！」
[バニラ]: 「いいね。グッドチョイス。私も、そうする」
[メイプル]: 「あたしは、どうしようかしら？」
[シナモン]: 「アレがいいんじゃない～？　船で一緒に歌ったときの」
[シナモン]: 「動画だけじゃなく、写真も撮ってもらってたよね～？」
[メイプル]: 「あー。」
[メイプル]: 「……そうね。　ちょっと恥ずかしい気もするけれど」
[メイプル]: 「あれが、この１年で私にとって、一番大切な想い出だわ」
[シナモン]: 「メーちゃんの一番大切な思い出に……わたしも写って……はぁはぁ……うっ」
[メイプル]: 「え？　自分だけ写ってる写真なんだけど……？」
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「One of Master! Oh, but, which one? Hmm...」
[Chocola]: 「Oh, I'll put in the photo to commemorate the opening of La Soleil. The one with you, Master, and Chocola!」
[Vanilla]: 「Nice. Good choice. I'll do the same.」
[Maple]: 「What should I go with?」
[Cinnamon]: 「Why not that one~? You know, the one of us singing on the boat together.」
[Cinnamon]: 「They didn't just take videos; there's photos from then, too, right~?」
[Maple]: 「Aah, yeah.」
[Maple]: 「...Right. I feel like that'd be kind of embarrassing.」
[Maple]: 「But that is the most precious memory of the year to me.」
[Cinnamon]: 「I'm going to be in... May-chan's most precious memory... Hah, hah... Uhhh...」
[Maple]: 「Huh? I'm picking one with just me in it, though...」
ModelAnswer:
**Chocola:** “Master’s! Ah, but which photo… hmm…”
**Chocola:** “Ah, let’s use the one from when La Soleil opened. The one of Master and Vanilla and me together!”
**Vanilla:** “Good choice. Excellent pick. I’ll do that too.”
**Maple:** “What should *I* do?”
**Cinnamon:** “How about that time we sang together on the boat?”
**Cinnamon:** “You got a video, but you also took photos, right?”
**Maple:** “Ah…”
**Maple:** “…Right. It’s a little embarrassing, but…”
**Maple:** “That’s my most precious memory from this past year.”
**Cinnamon:** “My most important memory with Me-chan… I’m in it too… haaah… ugh…”
**Maple:** “Huh? But the photo only has me in it…?”
